entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 01:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -29.1°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -34.3°C
Wind: WNW 26 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
